
// Incorporate INVETORY_DATASET variable into your code
//{ITEM_ID, NAME, RATE, QUANTITY}

// Incorporate HASH_DATASET variable into your code
//{KEY, NAME}
// It is just input data; Take help of it to design your Inventory Object; take care of data type, I just take it long ; for example, NAME should be string variable 
// Insert following information to your hash with chaining data structure

//////////////////////////////////
//TEST CASES for final assignment
/////////////////////////////////
// IN MAIN()
9400000011 // This customer buys following three ITEMS
111100000011 // ITEM1 
3            //buy 3 in quintity
222200001114 // ITEM2
1            //buy 1 in quintity
222200001234 // ITEM3
2            //buy 2 in quintity

Then print the bill as told in ppt and video

// printfollowing ITEM or product info ; that should be call by manager object ; so we can confirm that invetory (quantity) is update after customer shoping episode
111100000011 // ITEM1 
222200001114 // ITEM2
222200001234 // ITEM3

// OUTCOME {ITEM_ID, NAME, RATE, QUANTITY}
111100000011, 11, 200, 17
222200001114, 51, 600, 19
222200001234, 91, 1000,18
